class.rdfs:comment: Used to describe membership in a loyalty programs (e.g. "StarAliance"), traveler clubs (e.g. "AAA"), purchase clubs ("Safeway Club"), etc.
class.rdfs:label: ProgramMembership

schema:hostingOrganization.rdfs:comment: The organization (airline, travelers' club, etc.) the membership is made with.
schema:hostingOrganization.rdfs:label: hostingOrganization

schema:member.rdfs:comment: A member of an Organization or a ProgramMembership. Organizations can be members of organizations; ProgramMembership is typically for individuals.
schema:member.rdfs:label: member

schema:membershipNumber.rdfs:comment: A unique identifier for the membership.
schema:membershipNumber.rdfs:label: membershipNumber
